homeDescription: This interface displays a number of data visualizations from AT-Election-Prediction-analyses. Click one of the options to see more.

dashboard.name: Dashboard
dashboard.description: The Dashboard offers a detailed week-by-week perspective on overall political activity on facebook.

predictions.name: Predictions
predictions.description: The Predictions view shows our Headcountdistribution distributed among parties over time on a week-to-week-basis.

trends.name: Raw Likes
trends.description: The Raw Likes view shows how Facebook-Likes are distributed among parties over time on a week-to-week-basis.

trendsAbsolute.name: Raw Likes - Absolute
trendsAbsolute.description: The Raw Likes Absolute view shows the absolute number of likes each party has received over time on a week-to-week-basis.

multiChart.name: Multichart
multiChart.description: See all exposure charts on one page.

timeseries.name: Timeseries
timeseries.description: This timeseries-chart shows for each Danish party how the likes of all users that predominantly like this party are distributed over all parties over time.

pie.name: Pie Chart
pie.description: This view shows where the likes of users of a specific party went as well as where a party's likes came from.

chord.name: Chord Chart
chord.description: This chord-chart shows the likes of all users that predominantly like one party are distributed over all parties aggregated over one or multiple weeks.

sankey.name: Sankey Chart
sankey.description: The sankey chart shows where a party's users' likes went and where a party's likes came from.

flow.name: Flow Chart
flow.description: This simple Like-Flow visualization simply shows the net-flow of likes between one party and the others.

waffle.name: Waffle Chart
waffle.description: The Waffle Chart view shows where the likes of users of a specific party went.
